scripts.postinstall: node -e "if (process.env.DATABASE_URL) { require('child_process').execSync('prisma generate', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { console.log('Skipping prisma generate: DATABASE_URL not set'); }"
scripts.vercel-build: node -e "if (process.env.DATABASE_URL) { require('child_process').execSync('prisma generate', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { console.log('Skipping prisma generate: DATABASE_URL not set'); }"
